4fb452ab-3e67-4187-8530-f0c02476c665.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 Agilist (SA) is a SAFe enterprise leadership professional who is part of a Lean-Agile transformation. Key areas of competency include the application of Lean-Agile principles, execution and release of value through Agile Release Trains (ARTs), and building an Agile portfolio with Lean-Agile budgeting.
4fb452ab-3e67-4187-8530-f0c02476c665.name: Certified SAFe® 5 Agilist

cfe883b8-3615-4328-b6a7-1f472ead60c2.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 Practitioner (SP) is a SAFe team member professional responsible for using Scrum, Kanban, and XP in a SAFe environment. Key areas of responsibility include planning Program Increments and iterations, breaking requirements into stories, developing incrementally with built-in quality, demoing value at a team and program level, and problem solving impediments to drive relentless improvement.
cfe883b8-3615-4328-b6a7-1f472ead60c2.name: Certified SAFe® 5 Practitioner

Earn the SAFe® 5 Practitioner certification

a7d9bc01-98e1-439d-a4e9-9d148a780aa2.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 Product Owner/Product Manager (POPM) is a SAFe professional who works with customers and development organizations to identify and write requirements. Key areas of competency include identifying customer needs, writing epics, capabilities, features, stories, and prioritizing work in order to effectively deliver value to the enterprise.
a7d9bc01-98e1-439d-a4e9-9d148a780aa2.name: Certified SAFe® 5 Product Owner/Product Manager

1ab24402-0d96-4bc1-90ae-6a8ab2bfff91.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 Program Consultant (SPC) is a SAFe implementation professional responsible for training leaders, change agents, consultants, and team members to drive a Lean-Agile transformation at enterprise scale. 3ff635f8-2e7d-49fd-a0c7-740dc85f1d10.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 Release Train Engineer (RTE) is a servant leader and coach responsible for driving end-to-end delivery of value in an Agile Release Train (ART) or Value Stream in a Lean-Agile enterprise. Key areas of competency include: facilitating Program-level ceremonies, leading program execution, coaching ARTs in relentless improvement, creating transparency using metrics to drive positive change, facilitating resolution of dependencies, impediments, and risks.

f815e91d-a10e-4fd3-a0a4-2eecc1f7ee16.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 Advanced Scrum Master (SASM) is a SAFe Scrum Master professional responsible for improving team results. Key areas of competency include: identifying and solving team anti-patterns, improving value flow using Kanban and engineering practices, supporting Program-level execution, and using problem-solving and advanced coaching techniques to drive relentless improvement.

58c2e152-178a-41cc-9fa1-40be9a082888.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 DevOps Practitioner (SDP) is a SAFe professional responsible for improving the complete flow of value through a Continuous Delivery Pipeline from idea to operational solution. 634fa43a-a53e-4291-b2a7-7866aed86fc9.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 Government Practitioner (SGP) is a SAFe change agent who uses principles and practices of the Scaled Agile Framework® to execute and release value through Agile Release Trains in order to lead a Lean-Agile transformation of a program inside a government agency.

20d3ae14-3aa4-4d46-8175-17734a3cbc2d.description: Ready to Train is a self-paced online learning series intended to prepare SPCs to deliver SAFe training. The series contains six 30-minute modules that include an overview, practical guidance on planning and delivering training, and self-reflection activities to help you build a training plan. Each module also includes short quizzes to check your understanding of the material. On completion of the series, you will be ready to train!
20d3ae14-3aa4-4d46-8175-17734a3cbc2d.name: SAFe Ready to Train

e74d52b2-a5f1-47be-aec7-0f6ac029372c.description: The Certified SAFe® 5 Program Consultant Trainer (SPCT) is the highest level of certification provided by Scaled Agile, Inc. The SPCT credential recognizes individuals who demonstrate superior knowledge, competency, and in-depth field experience in adopting Agile across an enterprise with the Scaled Agile Framework®. SPCTs are the leading change agents and leaders in an organization’s Lean-Agile transformation and implementation.
e74d52b2-a5f1-47be-aec7-0f6ac029372c.name: Certified SAFe® 5 Program Consultant Trainer

badge_template_activities.title: Bachelor's degree or equivalent in technology or business
Eighty days of SAFe training and consulting experience in the past 12 months with two or more organizations
Three years of training experience with high feedback scores
Fifteen years of technical industry experience, including five years of Agile experience and five years of software development or product manager experience
One year of experience or more with the sponsoring Gold partner
Five years of consulting experience
Earn the SAFe 5® Program Consultant certification
Minimum of one year experience as a Certified SAFe® 5 Program Consultant
Application of Lean-Agile Principles as a coherent platform for effective decision-making and relentless improvement

298f8be2-027a-40bc-bd23-de2fb81b5c1b.description: The SAFe® Practice Consultant-T (SPCT) certification is the highest level of certification provided by Scaled Agile. The SPCT program recognizes individuals who demonstrate superior knowledge, competency, and in-depth field experience in adopting Agile across an Enterprise with the Scaled Agile Framework®. SPCTs become the leading change agents in an organization’s Lean-Agile transformation and implementation. What’s more, SPCTs have a proven track record as expert trainers.
298f8be2-027a-40bc-bd23-de2fb81b5c1b.name: Certified SAFe® 6 Practice Consultant-T

05804c22-4111-45c2-9f4b-2009207e2736.description: A SAFe® In-country Reviewer is a Scaled Agile Framework® expert who collaborates with the Scaled Agile Globalization team to translate the SAFe glossary and other assets into a number of foreign languages. SAFe In-Country Reviewers share and contribute their SAFe knowledge and experience by producing high-quality translations in their native languages.
05804c22-4111-45c2-9f4b-2009207e2736.name: SAFe® In-country Reviewer

badge_template_activities.title: Possess subject matter expertise in the Scaled Agile Framework.
Hold the SAFe Program Consultant certification.
Be natively fluent in one of the target languages, and professionally fluent in English
Actively participate in the translation and review of SAFe-related assets.

1be5b5cb-a58c-4158-b9f7-97a0a24f55e6.description: SAFe® Fellows are the foremost experts who provide industry leadership on Lean-Agile transformations using the Scaled Agile Framework®. A SAFe Fellow possesses extensive background and experience in software/systems development, Lean-Agile methods, Scaled Agile Framework® expertise, and SAFe® thought leadership.
1be5b5cb-a58c-4158-b9f7-97a0a24f55e6.name: SAFe® Fellow

badge_template_activities.title: 20 years minimum of software/systems development experience with 10 years in Lean-Agile methods and SAFe®
Three to five Enterprise SAFe® Lean-Agile transformations that demonstrate substantive and measurable business benefits
Significant hands-on field application at the Program, Value Stream, and Portfolio Levels
Significant contribution to advancing SAFe® practices and knowledge
Knowledge sharing through authorship (articles, books, blogs),  guidance, and public speaking
Referenceable case studies

300593ec-5979-4f35-acc0-09cc63756b01.description: The GOLD/SPCT Transformation partners have earned the highest level of certification available from Scaled Agile and have demonstrated the ability to lead organizations through the adoption and implementation of the Scaled Agile Framework. Only Gold SPCT partners can deliver Implementing SAFe and public SAFe Release Train Engineer courses.
300593ec-5979-4f35-acc0-09cc63756b01.name: Gold SPCT Transformation Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Maintain at least 1 SPCT in good standing
Maintain a minimum of 4 Certified SAFe Program Consultants on staff
Maintain 80% utilization of the SAFe courseware
Successful Lean-Agile transformation for 3 or more Enterprises using the guidance provided by the SAFe Implementation Roadmap
2 days of annual pairing with the Scaled Agile Advisory Services team

896cbda1-2ec3-4755-a6cc-8d3dc3741f78.description: This badge recognizes the earner for their dedication to sharing their knowledge of and experience with the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe®) in various enterprises. SAFe® Community Contributors directly provide content that is included in either the Framework primary knowledge base or in the associated guidance articles.
896cbda1-2ec3-4755-a6cc-8d3dc3741f78.name: SAFe® Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: Directly provided content that is included in either the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe®) primary knowledge base or in the associated guidance articles
Hold one or more Scaled Agile Certifications
